wikipedia_page.main: Geraint Løvgreen is a Welsh singer-songwriter.He has been described as one of the most prolific composers of his era, and one of the wittiest of writers.His daughter Mari Lovgreen is a Welsh television presenter.

response: A winner of the BAFTA Cymru Best Newcomer in 2006, Lövgreen's father is the acclaimed Welsh singer-songwriter, Geraint Lövgreen.
